net.jordaria

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jordaria.Configuration

  • public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object
    The settings and configurations for various parts of the program This is so changes across the entire game can be made quickly and easily with minimal recompiling.
    Author:
    Ches Burks

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean getDEBUG_SHOW_ENTITYMOVE()
      Returns true if the debug window should show entityMove events, otherwise false.
      boolean getDEBUG_SHOW_KEYPRESSES()
      Returns true if the debug window should show key presses, otherwise false.
      boolean getDEBUG_SHOW_STARTINGSYSTEMS()
      Returns true if the debug window should show subsystems starting, otherwise false.
      boolean getDebugActive()
      Returns true if debug is active, otherwise false.
      int getDisplay_bitsPerPixel()
      Returns the display bits per pixel for OpenGL.
      int getTile_Size()
      Returns the size of a tile.
      int getWindow_height()
      Returns the window height in pixels.
      java.lang.String getWindow_title()
      Returns the window title for the GUI.
      int getWindow_width()
      Returns the window width in pixels.
